src.api.auth module

class src.api.auth.OAuth2PasswordRequestFormEmail(email=Form(PydanticUndefined), password=Form(PydanticUndefined), scope=Form(), client_id=Form(None), client_secret=Form(None))[source]

Bases: OAuth2PasswordRequestForm

Custom OAuth2 password request form that requires an email instead of a username.

Parameters:

  • password (str)

  • scope (str)

  • client_id (str)

  • client_secret (str)

  • db (AsyncSession) – The database session dependency.

A message indicating the confirmation status.

Authenticates a user and returns an access token.

  • db (AsyncSession) – The database session dependency.

Returns:

async src.api.auth.register_user(user_data, background_tasks, request, db=Depends(get_db))[source]

Registers a new user in the system.

Parameters:

  • user_data (UserCreate) – The data required to create a user.

  • background_tasks (BackgroundTasks) – Tasks to be executed in the background.

  • request (Request) – The HTTP request instance.

  • db (AsyncSession) – The database session dependency.

Returns:

The newly registered user.

Return type:

User

async src.api.auth.request_email(body, background_tasks, request, db=Depends(get_db))[source]

Requests an email confirmation for a user.

Parameters:

  • body (RequestEmail) – The request containing the email to confirm.

  • background_tasks (BackgroundTasks) – Background task manager.

  • request (Request) – The HTTP request instance.

  • db (AsyncSession) – The database session dependency.

Returns:

A message indicating whether the confirmation email was sent.

Return type:

dict

  • db (AsyncSession) – Database session dependency.

  • user (User) – Current authenticated user.

  • user (User) – Current authenticated user.

async src.api.contacts.read_contacts(name=Query(None), email=Query(None), db=Depends(get_db), user=Depends(get_current_user))[source]

Retrieve a list of contacts with optional filtering by name and email.

Parameters:

  • name (Optional[str]) – Contact name to filter results.

  • email (Optional[str]) – Contact email to filter results.

  • db (AsyncSession) – Database session dependency.

  • user (User) – Current authenticated user.

Returns:

A list of contacts matching the filter criteria.

Return type:

Sequence[ContactOut]
